text: Apani tate kakhano salatera jan'ya damrabena na [1]; ye masajidera bhitti prathama dina theke'i sthapita hayeche takoyara upara [2], ta'i apanara salatera jan'ya damranora besi hakadara. Sekhane emana loka ache yara uttamarupe pabitrata arjana bhalabase, ara pabitrata arjanakariderake allahâ€Œ pachanda karena
